import { App, Button } from '@sui/core';

# 默认主题

得益于 css in js 强大而灵活的能力，自定义一套主题是非常简单的，你不需要配置任何编译工具，也不需要安装额外的插件，直接构建并传入 App 组件即可。
ShitUI 默认主题基于 [Emotion-Theming]('https://emotion.sh/docs/theming')

## 颜色

ShitUI 包括一个开箱即用的默认调色板，如果您没有自己的特定品牌，这是一个很好的起点。
您可以通过`theme`对象或`css props`来访问颜色

```jsx
import { useTheme, Text } from '@sui/core';

const MyComponent = () => {
  const { theme } = useTheme();

  return (
    <div>
      <Text
        css={{
          color: 'red',
          fontSize: '6em',
          padding: '2em 4em',
        }}>
        Using tokens
      </Text>
    </div>
  );
};
```

默认情况下，这些颜色可由`color`、`borderColor`、`backgroundColor`、`fill`等使用，这是完整的属性列表:

```jsx
export default {
  colors: {
    // generic colors
    white: '#ffffff',
    black: '#000000',

    // background colors (light)
    background: '$white',
    backgroundAlpha: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)', // used for semi-transparent backgrounds like the navbar
    foreground: '$black',
    backgroundContrast: '$white',

    // ... rest of colors (secondary, success, warning, error, etc)
  },
};
```

这里是一些主要参考：

<Row>
  <Card>1</Card>
</Row>

## 文字

- 字体

```jsx
export default {
  // default theme object
  colors: {...}, // color palette object
  fonts: {
    sans: "-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Roboto',
    'Oxygen', 'Ubuntu', 'Cantarell', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;",
    mono: "Menlo, Monaco, 'Lucida Console', 'Liberation Mono',
    'DejaVu Sans Mono', 'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono'"
  }
  ...
};
```

- 大小

```jsx
export default {
  // default theme object
  colors: {...}, // color palette object
  fonts: {...}, // font families object
  fontSizes: {
    xs: '0.75rem', /* 12px */
    sm: '0.875rem', /* 14px */
    base: '1rem', /* 16px */
    md: '1rem', /* 16px */
    lg: '1.125rem', /* 18px */
    xl: '1.25rem', /* 20px */
    '2xl': '1.5rem', /* 24px */
    '3xl': '1.875rem', /* 30px */
    '4xl': '2.25rem', /* 36px */
    '5xl': '3rem', /* 48px */
    '6xl': '3.75rem', /* 60px */
    '7xl': '4.5rem', /* 72px */
    '8xl': '6rem', /* 96px */
    '9xl': '8rem', /* 128px */
  }
  ...
};
```

- 粗细

```jsx
export default {
  // default theme object
  colors: {...}, // color palette object
  fonts: {...}, // font families object
  fontSizes: {...}, // font sizes object
  fontWeights: {
    hairline: 100,
    thin: 200,
    light: 300,
    normal: 400,
    medium: 500,
    semibold: 600,
    bold: 700,
    extrabold: 800,
    black: 900
  }
  ...
};
```

- 行高

```jsx
export default {
  // default theme object
  colors: {...}, // color palette object
  fonts: {...}, // font families object
  fontSizes: {...}, // font sizes object
  fontWeights: {...}, // font weights object
  lineHeights: {
    xs: 1, /* 16px */
    sm: 1.25, /* 20px */
    base: 1.5, /* 24px */
    md: 1.5, /* 24px */
    lg: 1.75, /* 28px */
    xl: 1.75, /* 28px */
    '2xl': 2, /* 32px */
    '3xl': 2.25, /* 36px */
    '4xl': 2.5, /* 40px */
    '5xl': 1, /* 16px */
    '6xl': 1, /* 16px */
    '7xl': 1, /* 16px */
    '8xl': 1, /* 16px */
    '9xl': 1 /* 16px */
  }
  ...
};
```

- 间距

```jsx
export default {
  // default theme object
  colors: {...}, // color palette object
  fonts: {...}, // font families object
  fontSizes: {...}, // font sizes object
  fontWeights: {...}, // font weights object
  lineHeights: {...}, // line heights object
  letterSpacings: {
    tighter: '-0.05em',
    tight: '-0.025em',
    normal: '0',
    wide: '0.025em',
    wider: '0.05em',
    widest: '0.1em'
  }
  ...
};
```

## 边框

- 半径

```jsx
export default {
  // default theme object
  colors: {...}, // color palette object
  fonts: {...}, // font families object
  fontSizes: {...}, // font sizes object
  fontWeights: {...}, // font weights object
  lineHeights: {...}, // line heights object
  radius: {
    xs: '7px',
    sm: '9px',
    md: '12px',
    base: '14px',
    lg: '14px', // preferred value by NextUI components
    xl: '18px',
    '2xl': '24px',
    '3xl': '32px',
    squared: '33%',
    rounded: '50%',
    pill: '9999px',
  }
  ...
};
```

- 粗细

```jsx
export default {
  // default theme object
  colors: {...}, // color palette object
  fonts: {...}, // font families object
  fontSizes: {...}, // font sizes object
  fontWeights: {...}, // font weights object
  lineHeights: {...}, // line heights object
  radii: {...}, // border radius object
  borderWeights: {
    light: '1px',
    normal: '2px',
    bold: '3px',
    extrabold: '4px',
    black: '5px'
  }
  ...
```

## Spacing

ShitUI 有一组最常用的空间值，允许您为项目自定义全局间距和大小比例。默认情况下，这些间距值可以被 `padding`、`width`、`height`、`margin` 和 `top`、`left`、`right`、`bottom`和更多样式引用

```jsx
export default {
  // default theme object
  // ... previous theme properties
  spacing: {
    0: '0rem',
    xs: '0.5rem',
    sm: '0.75rem',
    md: '1rem',
    lg: '1.375rem',
    xl: '2.25rem',
    '2xl': '3rem',
    '3xl': '5rem',
    '4xl': '10rem',
    '5xl': '14rem',
    '6xl': '18rem',
    '7xl': '24rem',
    '8xl': '32rem',
    '9xl': '40rem',
    min: 'min-content',
    max: 'max-content',
    fit: 'fit-content',
    screen: '100vw',
    full: '100%',
    px: '1px',
    1: '0.125rem',
    2: '0.25rem',
    3: '0.375rem',
    4: '0.5rem',
    5: '0.625rem',
    6: '0.75rem',
    7: '0.875rem',
    8: '1rem',
    9: '1.25rem',
    10: '1.5rem',
    11: '1.75rem',
    12: '2rem',
    13: '2.25rem',
    14: '2.5rem',
    15: '2.75rem',
    16: '3rem',
    17: '3.5rem',
    18: '4rem',
    20: '5rem',
    24: '6rem',
    28: '7rem',
    32: '8rem',
    36: '9rem',
    40: '10rem',
    44: '11rem',
    48: '12rem',
    52: '13rem',
    56: '14rem',
    60: '15rem',
    64: '16rem',
    72: '18rem',
    80: '20rem',
    96: '24rem'
  }
  ...
};
```

## Z-index

ShitUI 提供了一组开箱即用的最小 `z-Indices` 来帮助控制组件的堆叠顺序。

```jsx
export default {
  // default theme object
  // ... previous theme properties
  zIndices: {
    1: '100',
    2: '200',
    3: '300',
    4: '400',
    5: '500',
    10: '1000',
    max: '9999'
  }
  ...
};
```
